data.quote: If you don't run your own life, somebody else will.
Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.
Never argue with stupid people, they will drag you down to their level and then beat you with experience.
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
I cannot teach anybody anything. I can only make them think.
Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
It is our duty as men and women to proceed as though the limits to our abilities do not exit.
The best portion of a good man's life, his little nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
My success just evolved from working hard at hand each day.
If your real desire is to do good, there is no need to wait for money before you do it; you can do it now, at this very moment, and just where you are.
The source and center of all man's creative power is his power of making images, or the power of imagination.
If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astonish ourselves.
